DicePlacementCondition - Class in progetto.model
Immutable class where compliance with the positioning constraints of a dice in the window frame is verified Rules for placing dice: -First dice to be placed along the edges -Other dice near one of those already positioned (orthogonally or diagonally) -Respect the imposed value and color constraints of the scheme -No dice near orthogonally with same color and/or same value -No two dice in the same position Rules that can be ignored thanks to the effects of the cards: -Ingore color bond -Ingore value bond -Ignore constraint of proximity to another dice
DicePlacementCondition(Dice, boolean, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class progetto.model.DicePlacementCondition
Constructor to add a dice with ignore conditions
